updateChallengesTree() - Method in class org.hazelwire.gui.GUIBuilder
This method makes sure that the Tree of Challenges is updated according to the currently selected Mod.
updateCombo(Mod) - Method in class org.hazelwire.gui.GUIBuilder
This method updates the Combo containing all Challenges in Mod selected.
updateConfig(String) - Method in class org.hazelwire.gui.GUIBuilder
This method updates the Text to contain the current value of the specified configuration option.
updateModList() - Method in class org.hazelwire.gui.GUIBuilder
This method invokes the redraw method on the list of selected Mods.
updateOptions() - Method in class org.hazelwire.gui.GUIBuilder
This method is used for drawing OptionsComposites for each of the Options the selected Mod has.
updatePackages(Mod) - Method in class org.hazelwire.gui.GUIBuilder
This method updates the Text that shows all packages belonging to the Mod selected.
updateProgressBar(int) - Method in class org.hazelwire.gui.GenerateDialog
This method updates the ProgressBar.
updateScoreLabels() - Method in class org.hazelwire.gui.GUIBuilder
This method updates both the labels that display the total amount of points that can be scored per Virtual Machine, with the current configurations.
updateSize() - Method in class org.hazelwire.gui.ModListPainter
Updates the size of the Canvas that is being painted on, so that the Canvas grows bigger when the selected Mods no longer fit on it.
updateSize() - Method in class org.hazelwire.gui.OverviewPainter
Updates the size of the Canvas that is being painted on, so that the Canvas grows bigger when the selected Mods no longer fit on it.
updateSize() - Method in class org.hazelwire.gui.TagListPainter
Updates the size of the Canvas that is being painted on, so that the Canvas grows bigger when the Tags do not fit on it.
updateTagtree(String) - Method in class org.hazelwire.gui.GUIBuilder
This method takes a search phrase and updates the Tree of Tags, leaving only those Tags and Mods that contain the search phrase in their name or description.
updateTagtree(Tree, String) - Static method in class org.hazelwire.gui.TagTree
This method updates the Tree according to a search phrase.
updateTree(Tree, int) - Static method in class org.hazelwire.gui.ChallengesTree
Method that updates the given Tree based on the index of the given Mod.
